sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text: This Act may be cited as the Emergency Management Assistance Compact Act.

sections.heading: Emergency Management Assistance Compact.
sections.text:
The State of Illinois
ratifies and approves the Emergency Management Assistance Compact and enters
into the Compact in substantially the following form:

sections.heading: Reimbursements and expenses. The Illinois Emergency Management Agency as the authorized representative of the State may use the Disaster Response and Recovery Fund to deposit any reimbursements received from a party state and to pay any expenses incurred relating to this Act
sections.text: Reimbursements and expenses. The Illinois Emergency Management Agency as the authorized representative of the State may use the Disaster Response and Recovery Fund to deposit any reimbursements received from a party state and to pay any expenses incurred relating to this Act.

sections.heading: The Interstate Disaster Compact Act is repealed.
sections.text: The Interstate Disaster Compact Act is repealed.

sections.heading: Effective date.
sections.text: This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
